languages.text: "Раз уж ты здесь — покажи мне, как у вас на Тассере развлекают господ".

traits.locale_text: "Развлеки меня".

languages.text: "Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."
languages.original_text: "Раз уж ты здесь — покажи мне, как у вас на Тассере развлекают господ".

traits.locale_text: "Since you are here, entertain me."
"Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."
"Entertain me."
"Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."
"Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."
"Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."
"Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."
"Since you are here, entertain me."

languages.text: “既然你在这里，让我看看塔瑟拉的贵族是怎么享乐的吧。”
languages.original_text: "Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."

traits.locale_text: “既然你在这里，让我看看塔瑟拉的贵族是怎么享乐的吧。”
“既然你在这里，让我开心一下吧。”
“既然你在这里，让我开心一下吧。”

languages.text: «Ya que estás aquí, enséñame cómo los thasserianos entretienen a sus nobles».
languages.original_text: "Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."

traits.locale_text: «Ya que estás aquí, enséñame cómo los thasserianos entretienen a sus nobles».
«Ya que estás aquí, haz algo para deleitarme».
«Ya que estás aquí, haz algo para deleitarme».

languages.text: "Madem buradasın, bana Thasseralıların soylularını nasıl eğlendirdiğini göster."
languages.original_text: "Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."

traits.locale_text: "Madem buradasın, bana Thasseralıların soylularını nasıl eğlendirdiğini göster."
"Madem buradasın, eğlendir beni."
"Madem buradasın, eğlendir beni."

languages.text: 「ここにいるなら、タッセーラ人が貴族をどうもてなすのかを見せてもらおう」
languages.original_text: "Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."

traits.locale_text: 「ここにいるなら、タッセーラ人が貴族をどうもてなすのかを見せてもらおう」
「ここにいるなら、{mf|俺|私}を楽しませてくれ」
「ここにいるなら、{mf|俺|私}を楽しませてくれ」

languages.text: « Puisque vous êtes là, montrez-moi comment les Thasseriens divertissent leur noblesse. »
languages.original_text: "Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque vous êtes là, montrez-moi comment les Thasseriens divertissent leur noblesse. »
« Puisque vous êtes là, divertissez-moi. »
« Puisque vous êtes là, divertissez-moi. »

languages.text: "Wo Ihr schon hier seid, zeigt mir, wie die Thasserianer ihre Adeligen unterhalten."
languages.original_text: "Since you are here, show me how the Thasserians entertain their nobles."

traits.locale_text: "Wo Ihr schon hier seid, zeigt mir, wie die Thasserianer ihre Adeligen unterhalten."
"Wenn Ihr schon hier seid, unterhaltet mich."
